EmailTemplate.name: WBN-2018-12-05 Takeways on AWS ReInvent.ES-20181205-Invite Send 5.ES 1 - HTML In
EmailTemplate.subject: Everything You Need to Know from AWS re:Invent
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://turbonomic.com/resources/wbn-aws-reinvent-takeaways/?utm_campaign=70157000001j4afAAA]]>
Register Now and Enter to Win $100 Amazon Gift Card <[[https://turbonomic.com/resources/wbn-aws-reinvent-takeaways/?utm_campaign=70157000001j4afAAA]]> Hi {{lead.First Name:default=there}}, Were you one of many who couldn't make it to Vegas for re:Invent? If so, we've got you covered. Join us for our Top 5 Takeaways from AWS re:Invent 2018 Webinar <[[https://turbonomic.com/resources/wbn-aws-reinvent-takeaways/?utm_campaign=70157000001j4afAAA]]> on Wednesday, December 5th at 11 a.m. ET.
Register Now <[[https://turbonomic.com/resources/wbn-aws-reinvent-takeaways/?utm_campaign=70157000001j4afAAA]]>
In this live 30-minute webinar <[[https://turbonomic.com/resources/wbn-aws-reinvent-takeaways/?utm_campaign=70157000001j4afAAA]]>, you will learn:
- Top announcements from AWS - What to expect from the cloud in 2019
- How organizations are benefitting from migrating their workloads to AWS - How Turbonomic helps our customers get to the cloud in days
I hope to see you there! Regards, Andrew PS. If you can't attend our webinar, register anyway to enter to win a $100 Amazon Gift Card <[[https://turbonomic.com/resources/wbn-aws-reinvent-takeaways/?utm_campaign=70157000001j4afAAA]]> and I'll send you the recording afterward.
